summary: Tested cache system, CoachLoginModal extraction, keywords functionality, and multi-date selection. All core features working correctly. Cache system implemented with 5-min TTL, CoachLoginModal extracted as separate component (226 lines), keywords save/modify working, search filters by keywords, multi-date selection functional.

issues: YouTube video shows 'Video unavailable' - the configured YouTube URL may be invalid or restricted (known issue from previous iterations)
